channel.title: Restoring Your Character Appearance 562
channel.description:
On every server there is a command which is something like ::npcme <id> it changes your character to a certain npc, on my server you'd type ::npcme 50 to become king black dragon.
After typing that, there is no way to change back so I want to make a command which will work for everyone who wants to switch back so i started it off but i need help:
[code] if(cmd[0].equals("restoreme")) { player.getActionSender().asNPC = false; player.set().npcId = '-1' player.set().gender = 1
} [/code] I am 100% sure that what i type above is incorrect. Can someone help me with this? What i want it to do is, i want it to go into the players XML file and set the "npcId" to -1 and gender to 1 and the "asNPC".
Thanks for the help.

item.title: Restoring Your Character Appearance 562
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

Flame_:

Did you even test it?

When i posted this, no i didn’t. But now that you mention it, I just did. I got a few errors but fixed them, so i changed the code to this:

        if(cmd[0].equals("restoreme")) {
                player.getActionSender().asNPC = false;
                player.set().npcId = "-1";
                player.set().gender = 1;
        
        }

Its not a big change just added the “;”. However, I get this compiler error now:

src\com\rs2hd\packethandler\CommandPacketHandler.java:56: error: cannot find sym
bol
                player.getActionSender().asNPC = false;
                                        ^
  symbol:   variable asNPC
  location: class ActionSender
src\com\rs2hd\packethandler\CommandPacketHandler.java:57: error: cannot find sym
bol
                player.set().npcId = "-1";
                      ^
  symbol:   method set()
  location: variable player of type Player
src\com\rs2hd\packethandler\CommandPacketHandler.java:58: error: cannot find sym
bol
                player.set().gender = 1;
                      ^
  symbol:   method set()
  location: variable player of type Player

Thanks for the help.

Read full topic

item.title: Restoring Your Character Appearance 562
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

On every server there is a command which is something like ::npcme
it changes your character to a certain npc, on my server you’d type ::npcme 50 to become king black dragon.

After typing that, there is no way to change back so I want to make a command which will work for everyone who wants to switch back so i started it off but i need help:

	if(cmd[0].equals("restoreme")) {
		player.getActionSender().asNPC = false;
		player.set().npcId = '-1'
		player.set().gender = 1
	
	}

I am 100% sure that what i type above is incorrect. Can someone help me with this? What i want it to do is, i want it to go into the players XML file and set the “npcId” to -1 and gender to 1 and the “asNPC”.

Thanks for the help.

Read full topic
